summary: a colour scheme with a blue background
name: clue
description:
Clue is a redesign of the "blue" colour scheme -- hence the name ;) -- with many colours changed and several new syntax categories added.
The cterm version has a black background.
Screenshots of Vim in vimdiff mode, with gui and cterm:
http://www.math.bas.bg/bantchev/vim/gvimdiff-clue.png
http://www.math.bas.bg/bantchev/vim/vimdiff-clue.png
install_details: Put the file into your "colors" directory.
